Module kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem
Package kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem

Class DialogManager

java.lang.Object
kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem.DialogManager
public final class DialogManager extends Object
Static class that is responsible for creating dialog windows for various scenes.
Author:
Timothy Albert Kline

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    displayPartDeletionError()
    Creates and displays an error dialog that a part cannot be deleted.
